interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AISI QUEENS Curly Bob Wig Short Ombre Brown Wig for Black Women Kinky Hair Middle Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Hair Wig for Women 14inch Review Date: 2021/01/14 Store: AISI QUEENS Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Coily', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.71 x 8.9 x 2.72 inches; 9.14 Ounces'} Review Text: I ordered this AISI QUEENS Short Bob Wig for Women for my wife and she says she likes the Brown color, the 14 inch length, the curvature of the hair, and she likes that it covers her scalp and hair fully.
My wife says she likes the density of this synthetic hair and she says that she likes that it is comfortable to wear, easy to put on and take off as needed by following the simple instructions and she likes the design and the styling of the wig cap and the buckle up adjustable straps. My wife says she has been wearing it for about 2 weeks now and she has only noticed very minor tangling and shedding in the first few days. She says that she likes that the kinky wig appears to be made with good quality synthetic materials, and that the wig seems to be durable, elegant, lightweight and curly.
My wife says the hair is soft, smooth to touch, and she likes that the wig fits her head shape snugly as she can adjust it as needed. She says she likes the texture of this wig and she likes that it doesn't smell and that she says she gets compliments from people in the last several days. She says so far so good and that considering the quality, and the price point, this wig appears to be good value for bucks. I would recommend it. Review Title: Stylish, and easy to put on, and take off! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Lihui Pre-Twisted Passion Twist Crochet Hair 6 Packs Pre-Looped Crochet Hair For Women 14inch Passion Twist Hair Crochet Braids Hair(14Inch,#1B) Lihui {'Brand': 'Lihui', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '9.6 x 6.2 x 2.4 inches; 12.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '755101858097'} I ordered these Lihui Pre- Twisted Passion twists crochet 6 packs hair for my wife and she likes them so much. She says they seem to be made of good quality materials and like that they are pe-twisted. My wife wanted to try out a different style so we got these crochet passion twists. She likes that they are lightweight, durable, and easy to install with simple to follow instructions. She says she likes that the twists are tight and bouncy and they are also soft and shiny. Another feature my wife likes is that the passion twists don't tangle easily as she since she fixed them. She likes that they comes with enough twists for her whole head, and even had extra after fixing the hair. My wife has ordered hair in the past that smelled bad, luckily these twists didn't have a foul odor. Overall, my wife was very happy with these twists and how beautiful they looked on her. I would recommend them. She says the eyelashes were easy to attach on her own eyelashes by following simple steps.
After applying them the lashes on, she says she likes how the false eyelashes blend well with her own natural eyelashes; giving them a more full look. She likes that they were made of good quality synthetic fibers, and they appear to be durable. She says she likes that they are lightweight, soft, and smooth. My wife likes that she can reuse them and she has reused them 6 times in the last 2+ weeks, and so far, so good.
For the quality, quantity and price, they are great value for money. I would recommend them. Overall my wife really likes the hair extension and she says that they are different, cute and they look natural and shiny. I would definitely recommend them. Durable, easy to fix and great value for money! JulyQueen 165g Crochet Braiding Hair Blonde Color Crochet Hair for Black Women Synthetic Hair Extension Fold Length 41 Inch 3 Pack JulyQueen {'Item model number': '165Ycl-543'} I ordered these JulyQueen 3 packs of Jumbo Kanekalon synthetic hair extensions for one of our daughters, and she says that she likes them a lot. Our daughter says that she likes the blonde color, the braiding style, and the long texture. She says that she likes that the hair is soft to touch, smooth, thick and full, and she likes that they are 24 inches long as she wanted the hair. Our daughter says that she wanted to try a different hair style and she used these hair extensions for her Sengalese twist and she says that she used 6 packs in total to complete the style as she has 3 packs of different colors and she decided to combine the Blonde and Rose Red colors with a little left over. She says she likes that the hair extensions were easy to install and braid and she says that she likes the look, the styling of the twist and she likes that the hair extensions seem to be made with good quality 100% Kanekalon synthetic fiber, and they appear to be comfortable on her hair, lightweight, tangle- free and durable.
Our daughter says that so far so good with the Senagalese twists and she says she likes how gorgeous they look on her. For the quality, quantity and price point, they seem to be good value for money. I would recommend them. She says she likes that these hair braids were easy and quick to install, and she says the hair is soft and smooth to touch and she likes that they are lightweight, don’t form tangles, and so far she has not experienced any itching. She did braids and twists and she says she does like the look, and she likes how she can change the pre-stretched braiding style by dipping the hair braids in hot water for them to set.
Our daughter says she likes that these hair twists appear to be made with good quality synthetic materials and they seem to be durable, comfortable on her head, and easy to wash and clean. So far she says that these braids appear to be good value for money, considering the quality and the price point. I would recommend them. Easy to install, soft and lightweight! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Targeted Demographic:** Engages predominantly with beauty products for women while showing an interest in skincare for men, particularly moisturizing solutions for dry skin.
- **Style Preference:** Enjoys lightweight, versatile hairstyles for a natural look, with a penchant for intricate braiding techniques and color variety.
- **Material Quality:** Values high-quality materials in beauty and skincare, emphasizing effective active ingredients and a preference for non-latex materials in cosmetics.
- **Installation & Ease of Use:** Prioritizes user-friendly applications and clear instructions, resonating with favorable experiences in both makeup tools and wigs that are easy to put on and take off.
- **Care & Maintenance:** Prefers low-maintenance solutions that seamlessly integrate into daily routines, including products that alleviate dryness without a greasy feel.
- **Satisfaction Indicators:** Seeks noticeable results with consistent use, valuing soft texture, comfort, and ease of application in beauty and skincare products.
- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Likely to recommend products based on positive experiences, focusing on quality, ease of use, and tangible benefits like durability and softness.
- **Value for Money:** Looks for a balance of quality and affordability, favoring options that deliver excellent results without breaking the bank.

Overall, the user appreciates high-quality, user-friendly beauty and skincare solutions that enhance their aesthetic and well-being, prioritizing comfort, effectiveness, and ease of maintenance, evident in their positive interactions with various products, including wigs.
